Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster

Necromancer sneers at Shockaract aiming the tip of his gun at the tip 
of the tanks gattling gun, "Iron Raptor trusts to easily." They were 
close enough now for either one to hit the other. "I've seen to much 
treachery from your kind to believe that a cease fire will ever be 
honored. Now take your lackeys and leave or I WILL make sure that you 
can't return to anywhere."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Gigas fired at the fireballs and blasted them clear away.
> 
> Gigas: I too, am an elemental...
> 
> Kracken: Nice, Gigas, why didn't you do that sooner?
> 
> Gigas: Didn't feel like it.
> 
> Shokaract: Nice, yes. Now there's no more need for fighting.
> 
> Shokaract aimed at Necromancer with his tank mode gattling gun.
> 
> Shokaract: Iron Raptor called...for a cease of firing...
> 
> ----- Original Message ----- 
> From: <cyberwolf4@p...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 10:31 PM
> Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> 
> 
> > Necromancer flew from side to side avoiding the missles. the horn

> > flamethrower posed no threat so Necromancer took the hits head 
> > on. "When will you learn about using elemental attacks on an 
> > elemental?" he raise his weapon and fired five fireballs. (One at 
> > each.)
